remarks:
Convert implication to equivalence using the Separation Scheme (Aussonderung) ~ ax-sep .  Similar to Theorem 1.3ii of [BellMachover] p. 463.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) 

---

 Convert implication to equivalence using the Separation Scheme (Aussonderung) ~ ax-sep .  Similar to Theorem 1.3ii of [BellMachover] p. 463.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
bm1.3ii.1 $e |- E. x A. y ( ph -> y e. x ) $.
bm1.3ii $p |- E. x A. y ( y e. x <-> ph ) $.
$d ph x $.
$d x y $.
